name: safe-marketplace
description: Plugin marketplace for Safe-wallet development tools

plugins.name: safe-engineering
plugins.description: AI-powered development tools for the Safe-wallet monorepo. Specialized agents for TypeScript/React/Next.js code review, feature architecture validation, multi-chain patterns, Redux store design, and Safe SDK integration. Based on compound-engineering by Kieran Klaassen (EveryInc). Includes 22 specialized agents, 17 commands, and 10 skills.
